title: PPE deliveries statistics (England): weekly reports
description: Experimental statistics about PPE (personal protective equipment) deliveries and related documents.
datasetNotes: On the landing page click on latest report this will open a further page. Scroll to documents and click on the latest link , a  further page will open the data is currently embedded on the page.
sizingNotes: Simple Table which is embedded in the page it may be possible to contact the producer to obtain in a different format.
notes: When this is due for transformation BAs will contact the producer to see if the data is available in a better format than the embedded tables.
